Arkhosian High Style [Arena Fighting]

Prerequisite: Cha 13 or dragonborn race, any martial class
Benefit: You gain a benefit with any of the following exploits you possess.


Associated Powers:
Commanderâ€™s Strike: If the ally hits, you can shift 1 square.
Piercing Strike: If you score a critical hit with this exploit, the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.
Reaping Strike: If you are a dragonborn, in lieu of dealing damage on a miss, you can instead use your dragon breath racial power as a free action.

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual, Dragon Magazine 368, page(s) 59.
